name: Make It!
description:
This game is an entry to the Blackthornprod #1 game jam, with the theme Game Developement.

I then thought of the idea, where the player himself could create his own art and then use that art to create his own fun and unique levels. Hopefully, you can try my little game out. If you do, I'll gladly take any opinions you might have of it!

- Erk
